Maximum HP.

evil-within:BonfireSpirits.FLAVOR: The spirits toss small bones and fragments into the fire, which brilliantly erupts each time...
DESCRIPTIONS: Curse was removed from the deck. NL The spirits were displeased.
was removed from the deck. NL +10 Maximum HP.

evil-within:DesignerInSpire.NAME: Event: Designer-In-Spire
evil-within:DesignerInSpire.FLAVOR: This will not do, no no. What is this style? Disgusting! Are you bleeeeding? Groooss.
DESCRIPTIONS: was removed from the deck, and a random card was Upgraded.

evil-within:Duplicator.NAME: Event: Duplicator
evil-within:Duplicator.FLAVOR: This will not do, no no. What is this style? Disgusting! Are you bleeeeding? Groooss.
DESCRIPTIONS: was duplicated.

evil-within:BigFish.NAME: Event: Big Fish
evil-within:BigFish.FLAVOR: As you make your way down a long corridor you see a banana, a donut, and a box floating about.
DESCRIPTIONS: The Donut was chosen. NL +5 Maximum HP.
The Box was chosen. NL A Regret curse and a
were added.

evil-within:Falling.NAME: Event: Falling
evil-within:Falling.FLAVOR: While in free fall you consider your options...
DESCRIPTIONS: was removed from the deck.

evil-within:FaceTrader.NAME: Event: Face Trader
evil-within:FaceTrader.FLAVOR: Face. Let me touch? Maybe trade?
DESCRIPTIONS: Boss gained a random face relic.

evil-within:OminousForge.NAME: Event: Ominous Forge
DESCRIPTIONS: Boss gained Warped Tongs and a Pain curse.

evil-within:Purifier.NAME: Event: Purifier
evil-within:Purifier.FLAVOR: Before you lies an elaborate shrine to a forgotten spirit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Boss removed a card.

evil-within:MatchAndKeep.NAME: Event: Match and Keep
evil-within:MatchAndKeep.FLAVOR: Twelve cards! Match them to keep them! Five tries, no do-overs. Are you ready? Let's start!
DESCRIPTIONS: Boss matched successfully and gained a card.
Boss matched successfully, but gained a Curse.

evil-within:GoldenShrine.NAME: Event: Golden Shrine
evil-within:GoldenShrine.FLAVOR: Before you lies an elaborate shrine to an ancient spirit.
DESCRIPTIONS: Boss gained a Regret curse in exchange for gold, and used this gold to buy a relic.

evil-within:GremlinSack.NAME: Gremlin Sack
evil-within:GremlinSack.FLAVOR: You were no match for the Gremlin and his bodyguard.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, add the following cards to your deck:
a Starter card
, a random Common, a random Uncommon, a random Rare, a random Uncommon Colorless, and a random Curse.
, a random Common, a random Uncommon, a random Rare, two random Curses.

evil-within:GremlinWheel.NAME: Wheel of Change
evil-within:GremlinWheel.FLAVOR: No one gets two spins, he says.
DESCRIPTIONS: At each Rest Site, you may spin the wheel once. Choosing to collect its reward uses up this relic.
This relic has been used up.

evil-within:CloakOfManyFaces.NAME: Coat of Many Faces
evil-within:CloakOfManyFaces.FLAVOR: It was Steve, and Bill, and Ian, and Fred, and John...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain Cultist Headpiece, Face Of Cleric, N'loth's Hungry Face, Gremlin Visage, and Ssserpent Head.

evil-within:BrokenWingStatue.NAME: Broken Wing Statue
evil-within:BrokenWingStatue.FLAVOR: A broken hunk of a once-magnificent statue.
DESCRIPTIONS: The cultists that worship the Awakened One will be interested in this.

evil-within:ShatteredFragment.NAME: Sharpened Fragment
evil-within:ShatteredFragment.FLAVOR: Once a broken statue - now a makeshift weapon.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a Crystal Shiv to your hand.

evil-within:RedIOU.NAME: Bandit Contract
evil-within:RedIOU.FLAVOR: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the #b3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.

evil-within:RedIOUUpgrade.NAME: Bandit Contract+
evil-within:RedIOUUpgrade.FLAVOR: An agreement from the Bandit trio - partially in exchange for a trinket, but mostly in exchange for their lives.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the #b3rd boss combat, Red Mask Bandits will assist you.

evil-within:KnowingSkull.NAME: Knowing Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, you may Wish for Souls, Success, or a Pick me Up.

evil-within:HeartBlessingRed.NAME: Ruby Heart Blessing
evil-within:HeartBlessingRed.FLAVOR: The heart is strong. The heart is pleased.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yStrength.

evil-within:HeartBlessingBlue.NAME: Sapphire Heart Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b10.

evil-within:HeartBlessingGreen.NAME: Emerald Heart Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yDexterity.

evil-within:TeleportStone.NAME: Teleport Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: You may skip any number of rooms the next time you move.
This relic has been used up.
